<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grim Insight](/Feats.aspx?ID=988) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 32 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Umbral Gnome](/Heritages.aspx?ID=14) heritage

</column>

---

Others’ attempts to scare you often grant you insights about your would-be bullies that you can then exploit. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect, you get a critical success instead, and the source of the fear effect is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to you until the end of your next turn.
name: Grim Insight
